name: Host Style Party
description:
Oh my gosh!!! My party’s gotten out of control! I just wanted to have fun but now I need to watch over my guests until 3 AM! It started with my friend inviting her friends and then… 

It’s so hard trying to keep the noise down, take the keys from the drunk designated drivers, and bring drunk people to the bathroom to puke… and on top of this- kick out all the wacko kids!

If there is too many complaints, the cops will come… I don’t want to get arrested.

This is going to be such a stressful night!
